alert.note: Alert for Menominee; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 7:06PM CDT until May 19 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MENOMINEE AND WESTERN SHAWANO COUNTIES... At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Wittenberg, or 15 miles south of Antigo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Neopit, Red River, Gresham, Mattoon, Bowler, Shepley, Lyndhurst, Middle Village and Zoar. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Green Bay.
